Job Description
Prepare and record accounting journal entries accurately and in a timely manner.
Understand, compile, and analyze financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow reports.
Perform bank reconciliation to ensure accuracy between company records and bank statements.
Maintain and update accounting records in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
Support monthly and annual closing processes.
Ensure financial data is complete, accurate, and well-documented.
Assist with audit and other accounting-related tasks as needed.
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.

Minimum 1 year of experience in accounting or a similar role.

Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.

Experience in preparing journal entries, financial statements, and bank reconciliation.

Proficient in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.

Detail-oriented with strong organizational and accuracy skills.

Able to work independently and collaboratively within a team.

Requirements
• Degree in Japanese Literature or a related field.
• Fluent in Japanese for meetings, emails, and client communication.
• Experience working with Japanese clients or Japanese companies in a B2B setting.
• Strong understanding of Japanese business culture.
• Ability to support various Japan focused business needs such as market research and competitor analysis.
• Good communication and project coordination skills.
• Attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks.

Job Description
• Manage B2B clients from Japan and handle daily communication.
• Provide support for Japan related business needs including research and analysis.
• Coordinate internal teams to deliver projects based on client requirements.
• Maintain strong relationships with Japanese clients and understand their expectations.
• Prepare reports and insights to help improve client outcomes.
• Monitor timelines and ensure all tasks related to Japanese accounts are completed.

Job Description:
Conduct vendor sourcing and selection processes in accordance with event requirements and company policies.
Assess and manage event budgets, including cost estimation, budgeting, and expense control.
Negotiate pricing, terms, and contracts with vendors to achieve cost efficiency and quality standards.
Coordinate with internal teams (event, finance, and operations) to ensure procurement needs are aligned with event objectives.
Monitor vendor performance and ensure timely delivery of goods and services for events.
Prepare procurement documentation, including vendor comparisons, contracts, and reports.
Ensure procurement processes comply with company procedures and timelines.
Support on-site event operations related to vendor coordination when required.

Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in any major (preferably Business, Management, or related fields).
Proven experience in procurement and/or event operations.
Prior experience working in events is required.
Strong skills in vendor selection, budget assessment, and cost analysis.
Good negotiation and communication skills.
Able to work under pressure and manage multiple vendors simultaneously.
Detail-oriented, well-organized, and able to meet tight deadlines.
Willing to work flexible hours, including weekends or during events if needed.

Job Description
Create and edit short-form video content (TikTok, Reels, YouTube Shorts) from concept to publishing.
Write scripts, captions, and hooks that grab audience attention quickly.
Use data and insights to analyze content performance and improve future strategies.
Edit videos using CapCut, Canva, or similar mobile tools with strong visual quality.
Design simple supporting graphics for video content.
Be willing to appear on camera when needed to boost engagement.
Keep up with social media trends to maintain fresh and relevant content.
Willing to work on weekends or outside normal hours if needed (with prior arrangement).

Minimum Qualifications
Minimum 1 year of experience in social media, media, agency, or creative industries.
Proven experience in creating short-form videos (TikTok, Reels, YouTube Shorts) with strong engagement.
Excellent storytelling and copywriting skills (captions, scripts, headlines, hooks).
Strong visual sense and basic graphic design skills (Canva or similar tools).
Proficient in video editing using mobile apps (CapCut, Canva, or equivalent).
Good understanding of social media trends and algorithms.
Comfortable appearing on camera when needed.
Analytical mindset with the ability to track and improve content performance using insights.

Job Description
Monitor data ingestion from multiple sources to ensure completeness & accuracy
Identify and log data-related issues, escalating critical issues to relevant teams when
necessary

Collaborate with technical teams to report and assist in resolving system or data flow
interruptions
Ensure scheduled updates for content across all monitored media types are accurate
and on time
Work closely with Product, Data, and Media Intelligence teams to ensure data
requirements are met
Provide periodic reports on data reliability, completeness, and quality to stakeholders

Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Communications, or a related field.
Basic skills in Python and SQL/query writing.
Strong interest in news and media, both mainstream and social media platforms.

Detail-oriented, analytical, and comfortable handling large datasets.

High attention to detail, strong problem-solving skills, and a strong willingness to be on standby when needed (mandatory).
Familiarity and knowledge of Api, Python, and data crawling/scraping are strong advantages.
Strong proficiency in Google Sheets, including formulas such as vlookup, regexmatch, and Remove Duplicates.

Job Description:
Cover and report on various sports events, including matches, tournaments, press conferences, and related activities.
Gather, verify, and analyze information from reliable sources such as athletes, coaches, officials, and stakeholders.
Write accurate, engaging, and timely sports news articles in accordance with journalistic standards and editorial guidelines.
Conduct interviews and produce insightful and relevant content.
Monitor and follow current sports news, trends, and developments at local, national, and international levels.
Coordinate with editors to plan coverage and meet publication deadlines.
Adhere to journalistic ethics and newsroom policies.
Perform field and desk reporting as required.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Journalism, Communication, or a related field is preferred.
Strong interest and knowledge in sports.
Excellent writing and storytelling skills in English.
Strong communication and interviewing abilities.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and flexible working hours, including evenings and weekends.
Able to work independently and collaboratively within a team.
Prior experience as a reporter or journalist is a plus.
